ðŸ“– Summary: WebGoat is a deliberately insecure web application designed to teach web application security lessons. It demonstrates common server-side flaws through hands-on exercises, allowing users to learn and practice penetration testing techniques. The application can be deployed via Docker or run as a standalone application.
